Question.Subject: Zwinky Help????????????
Question.Content: I was on my Zwinky and when i changed and saved it, i had to go to another room to see it on. Someone said to wait, and if tht is true, how long???? Also, how old do u think u should be to get a Zwinky. No rude comments please :)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Sometimes it just depends on your computer, try deleting your cookies. here's how:
1.) Open Internet Explorer and click on the "Tools" menu. 2.) In the "Tools" menu, click on "Internet Options". 3.) The Internet Options pop-up window appears. 4.) Under the General Tab select the "Delete Cookies" button. 5.) Delete cookies by clicking "OK".
And I think you should be at LEAST 13 years old. There are some nasty people on there lol ;D

Answer.Content:
Sometimes it just depends on your computer, try deleting your cookies. here's how:
1.) Open Internet Explorer and click on the "Tools" menu. 2.) In the "Tools" menu, click on "Internet Options". 3.) The Internet Options pop-up window appears. 4.) Under the General Tab select the "Delete Cookies" button. 5.) Delete cookies by clicking "OK".
And I think you should be at LEAST 13 years old. There are some nasty people on there lol ;D
